description: [``botocore``] This release adds support to provide guardrail configuration and modify inference parameters that are then used in RetrieveAndGenerate API in Agents for Amazon Bedrock.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for specifying email message headers for Email Templates, Campaigns, Journeys and Send Messages.
[``botocore``] Update the DNS Firewall settings to correct a spelling issue.
[``botocore``] Added support for application-aware start/stop of SAP applications running on EC2 instances, with SSM for SAP
[``botocore``] Adds policy effect and actions fields to Policy API's.
